reviews.review: I mean, from Ravenholm to City 17, to inside the Citadel, this game is the gift that just keeps on giving. Truly one of the greatest games of all time and here it is for Maximum 7 pounds. My journey across the ten hours I spent with HL2 (will be replaying soon), will be remebered forever, whether its throwing a wheely bin using a gravity gun at a headcrab, or killing combine soldiers who are tryna take their job really seriously with a toilet. And its not all laughs, I've never (not even during Portal 2's final hours) felt more invested in a single videogame world. I wanted to take down the combine, overthrow City 17 with Barney and Alyx. And that ending (no spoilers), but that ending. Chills. The perfect gaming package, a great story, likeable characters, great gameplay and a brilliant world to explore. No its doesn't have a massive Assasins Creed open world, yes it is linear. But not once did i feel like i didnt get to explore. This packaged with episode 1 (the worst one) and episode 2 (what a finally) is tru;y my favourite game ever and dispite the lack of ports to the PS5 or Xbox Series X, i hope this game gets played for decades to come, I mean 2004 and the graphics still hold up, GG Valve.
